analysis.description:
HardcodedCrowdsale.ICOBuy (/unique_chucks/18/0x36995d4e1ab6ee76aa55f16736fc85ec6e7b6c1d.sol#227-250) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-managedTokenLedger.mint(_for,tokensBought) (/unique_chucks/18/0x36995d4e1ab6ee76aa55f16736fc85ec6e7b6c1d.sol#240-241)

HardcodedCrowdsale.refundICO (/unique_chucks/18/0x36995d4e1ab6ee76aa55f16736fc85ec6e7b6c1d.sol#259-273) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-managedTokenLedger.demint(msg.sender,tokenValue) (/unique_chucks/18/0x36995d4e1ab6ee76aa55f16736fc85ec6e7b6c1d.sol#268-269)

HardcodedCrowdsale.manualSendTokens (/unique_chucks/18/0x36995d4e1ab6ee76aa55f16736fc85ec6e7b6c1d.sol#277-285) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-managedTokenLedger.mint(rAddress,amount) (/unique_chucks/18/0x36995d4e1ab6ee76aa55f16736fc85ec6e7b6c1d.sol#281-285)

Reentrancy in HardcodedCrowdsale.ICOBuy (/unique_chucks/18/0x36995d4e1ab6ee76aa55f16736fc85ec6e7b6c1d.sol#227-250):
	External calls:
	- balanceOf(_for) == 0 (/unique_chucks/18/0x36995d4e1ab6ee76aa55f16736fc85ec6e7b6c1d.sol#239-240)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- ICOcontributors (/unique_chucks/18/0x36995d4e1ab6ee76aa55f16736fc85ec6e7b6c1d.sol#239-240)

Reentrancy in HardcodedCrowdsale.ICOBuy (/unique_chucks/18/0x36995d4e1ab6ee76aa55f16736fc85ec6e7b6c1d.sol#227-250):
	External calls:
	- balanceOf(_for) == 0 (/unique_chucks/18/0x36995d4e1ab6ee76aa55f16736fc85ec6e7b6c1d.sol#239-240)
	- managedTokenLedger.mint(_for,tokensBought) (/unique_chucks/18/0x36995d4e1ab6ee76aa55f16736fc85ec6e7b6c1d.sol#240-241)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- ICOcollected (/unique_chucks/18/0x36995d4e1ab6ee76aa55f16736fc85ec6e7b6c1d.sol#248-249)
	- ICOtokensSold (/unique_chucks/18/0x36995d4e1ab6ee76aa55f16736fc85ec6e7b6c1d.sol#249-250)
	- balancesForICO (/unique_chucks/18/0x36995d4e1ab6ee76aa55f16736fc85ec6e7b6c1d.sol#241-243)
	- weiForRefundICO (/unique_chucks/18/0x36995d4e1ab6ee76aa55f16736fc85ec6e7b6c1d.sol#243-244)
	- weiToRecoverICO (/unique_chucks/18/0x36995d4e1ab6ee76aa55f16736fc85ec6e7b6c1d.sol#247)

Reentrancy in HardcodedCrowdsale.manualSendTokens (/unique_chucks/18/0x36995d4e1ab6ee76aa55f16736fc85ec6e7b6c1d.sol#277-285):
	External calls:
	- managedTokenLedger.mint(rAddress,amount) (/unique_chucks/18/0x36995d4e1ab6ee76aa55f16736fc85ec6e7b6c1d.sol#281-285)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- ICOtokensSold (/unique_chucks/18/0x36995d4e1ab6ee76aa55f16736fc85ec6e7b6c1d.sol)
	- balancesForICO (/unique_chucks/18/0x36995d4e1ab6ee76aa55f16736fc85ec6e7b6c1d.sol)

HardcodedCrowdsale.getWeekBonus (/unique_chucks/18/0x36995d4e1ab6ee76aa55f16736fc85ec6e7b6c1d.sol#210-227) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= (ICOstart + 604800) (/unique_chucks/18/0x36995d4e1ab6ee76aa55f16736fc85ec6e7b6c1d.sol#212-226)
	- block.timestamp <= (ICOstart + 3628800) && block.timestamp <= (ICOstart + 4233600) (/unique_chucks/18/0x36995d4e1ab6ee76aa55f16736fc85ec6e7b6c1d.sol#219-226)
	- block.timestamp <= (ICOstart + 2419200) && block.timestamp <= (ICOstart + 3024000) (/unique_chucks/18/0x36995d4e1ab6ee76aa55f16736fc85ec6e7b6c1d.sol#216-226)
	- block.timestamp <= (ICOstart + 1209600) && block.timestamp <= (ICOstart + 1814400) (/unique_chucks/18/0x36995d4e1ab6ee76aa55f16736fc85ec6e7b6c1d.sol#214-226)

HardcodedCrowdsale.Hardcap should be constant (/unique_chucks/18/0x36995d4e1ab6ee76aa55f16736fc85ec6e7b6c1d.sol#60-61)
HardcodedCrowdsale.ICOend should be constant (/unique_chucks/18/0x36995d4e1ab6ee76aa55f16736fc85ec6e7b6c1d.sol#58-59)
HardcodedCrowdsale.ICOprice should be constant (/unique_chucks/18/0x36995d4e1ab6ee76aa55f16736fc85ec6e7b6c1d.sol#70)
HardcodedCrowdsale.ICOstart should be constant (/unique_chucks/18/0x36995d4e1ab6ee76aa55f16736fc85ec6e7b6c1d.sol#57-58)
HardcodedCrowdsale.Softcap should be constant (/unique_chucks/18/0x36995d4e1ab6ee76aa55f16736fc85ec6e7b6c1d.sol#62-63)
HardcodedCrowdsale.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/18/0x36995d4e1ab6ee76aa55f16736fc85ec6e7b6c1d.sol#67-68)
HardcodedCrowdsale.minTokensToBuy should be constant (/unique_chucks/18/0x36995d4e1ab6ee76aa55f16736fc85ec6e7b6c1d.sol#55-57)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/18/0x36995d4e1ab6ee76aa55f16736fc85ec6e7b6c1d.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/18/0x36995d4e1ab6ee76aa55f16736fc85ec6e7b6c1d.sol#1): it allows old versions
